pages.title:
If you select a third-party service, you'll be redirected to their site to finish creating an avatar.
To create an avatar using a third-party service, you must first download their app and agree to their terms of use and privacy policy, hereafter "other service's terms."
Copyrights and other intellectual property rights pertaining to any avatars created using a third-party service shall be governed by the other service's terms.
